item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans!

Join me  for the for a fun night or an awesome weekend at the Boston Salsa Festival. This is the PERFECT way to IMMERSE yourself in the Salsa Scene, whether you're a beginner or advanced dancer. There will be GREAT instructors and performers, some visiting from as far as Europe, Great LIVE Music, and the most talented DJ's in Boston.  Let's meet at 7:30 to get to know each other for a bit before starting the classes.

 

** THIS IS A 3 DAY EVENT. We have ONLY 10 FULL WEEKEND PASSES for a discount price of $175. This includes access to all the evening parties, concerts, and Saturday and Sunday Full Day workshops. Purchase through Meetup Now to get the Full Pass.

** 3 NIGHT Evening passes are also available for $80 ($85 after Aug 15). Please email us to purchase.

Individual day evening or day workshop passes are also available, but must be purchased at the door.

** When you RSVP, please tell us which days you are coming!

Age: All Ages

Dress Code: Smart Casual to Dressy

ID: Bring your ID just in case needed for bar


Friday Schedule:

9pm-10pm Spectacular Performances

10pm-3am Dance with the most talented DJs in Boston

 

Visit the website for Saturday and Sunday Schedule http://www.bostonsalsafest.com/workshops.html

Here are the Details:


Welcome to the 2012 Boston Salsa Festival Where salsa music, dance, and entertainment come together for an unforgettable experience.

Join us September 7-9, 2012 for the 2012 Boston Salsa Festival. Don't miss out on this wonderful event featuring:

  • Inspiring performances by world class dancers
  • Top-notch instructors teaching salsa, bachata, percussion, and more
  • Entertaining DJs spinning the hottest salsa, mambo, chachacha, and bachata music
  • The fabulous music of Ritmo Masacote, a 12-piece Salsa/Timba/Latin Jazz Orchestra
  • Social dancing til your legs fall off

The Boston Salsa Festival is brought to you by two of the most recognized names in the Boston Salsa Community: Andres Giraldo and DJ Hernan. Registration is now OPEN. Don't miss out!!

See you there !!!


-Angel
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a black fedora hat.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Salsa Festival !!!!
